private.title: Private
private.description: Access allowed only with permission of the owner on an individual basis

destination.title: Destination
destination.description: Access allowed only to reach a destination

designated.title: Designated
designated.description: Access allowed according to signs or specific local laws

dismount.title: Dismount
dismount.description: Access allowed but rider must dismount

yes.title: Allowed
yes.description: Access allowed by law; a right of way

no.title: Prohibited
no.description: Access not allowed to the general public

emergency.title: Emergency
emergency.description: Access allowed only to emergency vehicles

permissive.title: Permissive
permissive.description: Access allowed until such time as the owner revokes the permission

permit.title: Permit
permit.description: Access allowed only with a valid permit or license
